Analyte(s): IgG autoantibodies against soluble liver antigen/liver-pancreas antigen (SLA/LP)
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Microwell plate reader (capable of measuring OD at 450nm and at 620nm)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for EUROIMMUN Anti-SLA/LP ELISA (IgG), a qualitative ELISA for detection of IgG anti-SLA/LP autoantibodies as an aid in diagnosing autoimmune hepatitis type 1.
Indications for Use Summary: For qualitative detection of IgG class autoantibodies against SLA/LP in human serum and plasma, used as an aid in the diagnosis of autoimmune hepatitis type 1, in conjunction with other laboratory and clinical findings.
